title: (x) humanist sans/rounded sans - MS Trebuchet/GE Inspira {Randy, Richard GH (self)}
content:
Can anyone help me out with these two typefaces?

 [‹ (x) The Upper Cuts record sleeve - ITC Machine, Challenge, ITC Serif Gothic {David, Stephen, Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084222/http:/typophile.com/node/17992 "Go to previous forum topic") [The Edison Walthall Hotel script logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013084222/http:/typophile.com/node/17896 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Richard Hunt

comments.content: Ironically, after posting above, I think one of them is GE Inspira, identified in the previous post.
Lulu is MS Trebuchet. System Font.

Thanks Randy

Man, am I embarrassed I didn’t recogize Trebuchet.
